definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: do, make (NH = BH; MI:23, MI:26 [[עשתי]], l.:3, l.:9 [[ואעש]], l.:24 Imv. [[עשו]]; OH n.pr. [[עשיו]], [[אלעשה]], [[מעשיהו]]; not Aram., and not certainly found in S. Sem. lang.; on Sab. v. esp. DHM:SB Berl. Ak. 1886, 849);—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: (1) c. acc. act. Ge 3:14 (J) Ge 20:10 (E) + oft.; do right in eyes of ´[[י]] 2Ki 12:3, 2Ki 14:13 +, evil 2Ki 8:18, 2Ki 8:27 + (cf. I. [[עַיִן]]

definitions.title: 3 c
definitions.body: ); do God's commands, statutes, etc., De 16:12, De 30:8, Nu 15:39 (P); [[חַיִל]] ´[[ע]] 1Sa 14:48 + do might, i.e. mightily, valiantly; Pr 31:39 do efficiency, i.e. efficiently; = commit (offence) Le 20:13 (H), De 20:18; sq. [[מִן]] part., [[וְעָשָׂה מֵאַחַת מֵהֵנׇּה]] Le 4:2 and shall do a single one of them (things prohibited; v. [[מִן]]

definitions.title: 3 b
definitions.body: (d)), cf. ´[[וְעָשׂוּ אַחַת מִכָּל־מִחְוֹת י]] v:Le 4:13, v:Le 4:22, Le 5:17 (all P); do = perform a work, c. acc. cogn. [[מַעֲשֶׂה]] Ex 18:20, Ex 23:12 (E), also (´[[י]] subj.) De 11:7, Da 9:14, Ec 3:11; c. acc. [[מְלָאכָה]] Ge 2:2, Ge 2:2 (J), Ex 20:9, Ex 20:10 = De 9:13 (10 Words); c. acc. [[דְּרָכֶיְ]] † Is 58:13; [[מְלוּכָה עַל]] ´[[ע]] 1Ki 21:7 = exercise sovereignty over; of ´[[י]] performing signs ([[אׂתׂת]]) Jos 24:17 (E), Nu 14:11, Nu 14:22 (JE), De 11:3, so Moses Ex 4:17 and ([[מׂפְתִים]]) v:Ex 4:21. (2) do something to one ([[ל]] pers.) Ge 20:9 (E), Ju Jdg 9:56 +; c. [[עַל]] reflex. Je 26:19 do evil against ourselves; esp. ´[[י]] subj., c. [[לְ]], do good to Ex 18:9 (E), 2Ki 8:66, or evil Ge 42:28 (E); in phr. so may God do to me, etc. 1Sa 3:17, 2Ki 6:31 + (v. [[יסף]]

definitions.title: Hiph. 1.
definitions.body: ). (3) do something for one ([[ל]] pers.) Ge 30:31, 1Ki 11:8 +, dir. obj. om. 1Sa 20:4; + [[ל]] rei Ju Jdg 21:7, Jdg 21:16 what shall we do for them, for wives ? c. [[עַל]] pers. Ne 5:19; c. dat. eth. ([[ל]]) 1Sa 10:7; c. [[לְ]], of ´[[י]] doing kindness for 1Sa 22:3; executing vengeance for Ju Jdg 11:36 (+ [[מִן]] of enemy); ´[[י]] doing a sign ([[אוֹת]]) for † Ju Jdg 6:17 (elsewhere [[נׇתַן אוֹת לְ]]), cf. [[עֲשֵׂה־עִמִּי אוֹת לְטוֹבָה]] Ps 86:17. (4) do something (in relation or intercourse) wilth ([[אֵת]] pers.), ´[[י]] subj. De 1:30 all that he did with you, De 10:21 (cf. Ps 86:17 supr.), human subj. 2Ch 24:24 (obj. [[שְׁפָטִים]]), Ru 2:11. (5) seldom c. [[ב]], usu. of executing judgment upon 1Sa 28:18, Is 48:14, more gen. Es 1:15 what shall we do with the queen ? also, subj. ´[[י]], Ez Eze 25:11, Eze 28:26, Ps 149:7, Ps 149:9, Nu 33:4 (on false gods); in good sense, ´[[חֲסָדִים בּ]] ´[[ע]] Ne 13:14. (6) of ´[[י]] doing the justice ([[מִשְׁפַּט]]) of any one, i.e. maintaining his cause 1Ki 8:45, 1Ki 8:49, Ps 9:5. (7) c. adv. do thus, [[כּׂה]], Jos 6:14 (JE), acc. to, [[כְּ]] Ge 6:22 (P), Ge 18:21 (J), 1Ki 2:6; acc. as, [[כַּאֲשֶׁר]] Ge 27:19 (J); Ex 1:17 (E) +; c. [[בְּ]] of manner, Ju Jdg 9:16 a, Ez Eze 8:18, Eze 25:15.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: work for ([[ל]] rei) Ge 30:30 (J); c. [[ל]] pers. 1Sa 14:6, Ez Eze 29:20 (for ´[[י]]); work in ([[ב]]) gold or other material 1Ki 7:14, 2Ch 2:6, 2Ch 2:13, Ex 31:4, Ex 31:5, Ex 35:32 (all P); c. [[בָּהּ]] (i.e. [[בָּעֲבׂדָה]]) Ex 5:9 (J) in toil; work with ([[עִם]]) God 1Sa 14:45, so prob. of God's working with ([[אֵת]]) Moses and Aaron 1Sa 12:6 (usu. appoint); c. [[אֵת]] with (of pers. in whose company, in whose field Ru 2:19, Ru 2:19 (gleaning); work [[בְּחֵפֶץ כַּפֶּיהָ]] Pr 31:13; without prep. Ex 36:1, Ne 3:28.
deal with, c. [[עִם]], 2Ch 2:2, Da 1:13 ([[כַּאֲשֶׁר]] acc. as); c. [[אֵת]], Ez Eze 20:44, Ps 109:21; Ez Eze 22:14, Zep 3:19 (perh.; Gr Now ins. [[כָּלָה]], v.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: c. obj. concr., ark Ge 8:6, altar Ge 13:4, idols Ju Jdg 18:24, Jdg 18:31 +, etc.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: oft. of God's making (creating) Ge 3:1 (J), Ge 1:7, Ge 1:16, Ge 1:25 (P), Ne 9:6, Job 9:9, Pr 8:26, 2Ch 2:11, Ps 95:5 +; making man Ps 100:3, Ps 119:73 (made by God's hands), in the womb Job 31:15, Job 31:15; making, constituting, nation De 26:19, De 32:6, De 32:15; pt. sf. [[עשֵׁׂהוּ]] his Maker Is 17:7, Pr 14:31, Pr 17:5 ([[הָעשׁׂוֹ]] Job 40:19 is improb., most rd. [[הֶעָשָׂוּי]], with various interpr. of foll. words); [[עשְֶׁׂ]] Is 51:13, [[עשֵׁׂנִי]] Job 32:23 (Ginsb; v:22 van d. H. Baer), [[עשֵׁׂנוּ]] Ps 95:6; so appar. pt. pl. [[עשָָׁׂי]] Job 35:10, [[עשַׁׂיִךְ]] Is 54:5 (Ges:§ 124 k expl. as sg.).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: make something, c. [[לְ]] reflex., make for thee Ex 20:4, De 9:12, De 10:1 +, for ([[ל]]) another 1Sa 2:19, 2Sa 7:11, 1Ki 2:24 +; obj. [[מִשְׁתֶּה]] banquet Ge 40:20, Es 5:4, also (no [[ל]]) Ge 29:22 (E) Ju Jdg 14:10, Es 5:5, Es 5:12 and (fig., ´[[י]] subj.) Is 25:6; c. [[ל]] rei, De 22:8; c. [[ל]] of animal Ge 33:17 (J).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: make a name ([[שֵׁם]]) for oneself ([[ל]]) 2Sa 7:9, 1Ch 17:8, also (no [[ל]]) 2Sa 8:13; a new heart for oneself ([[ל]]) Ez Eze 18:31.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: make war with ([[אֶת]]) Ge 14:2, Jos 11:18 (D); c. [[עִם]], De 20:12, De 20:20, 1Ch 5:10, 1Ch 5:19; abs. 1Ch 22:8; c. [[ל]] reflex. Pr 24:6; pt. [[עשֵׁׂה מִלְחָמָה]] 2Ch 11:1, 2Ch 26:11, 2Ch 26:13; make peace, c. [[ל]] pers. Jos 9:15 (J); [[אִתִּי בְרָכָה]] ´[[ע]] 2Ki 18:31 make an agreement with me.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: c. [[ב]], ´[[פֶּרֶץ בּ]] ´[[ע]] Ju Jdg 21:15 ´[[י]] brought a catastrophe upon (cf. [[פרץ]]).

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: c. 2 acc., make something out of (acc. mater.) Ex 25:18, Ex 28:13, Ex 37:17, Ex 37:24, Ct So 3:10, De 10:3 +; make something into something (Ges:§ 117 ii) Ho 8:4, Ge 27:9, Ju Jdg 17:4, Nu 11:8, Nu 17:3, Ps 104:4; make something [[כָּלָה]], i. e. utterly destroy it Na 1:8, Zep 1:18, Ez Eze 20:17, Ne 9:31; c. pt. pass. as 2nd acc. Ex 38:7 they made it [[נְבוּב לֻחׂת]] hollow with boards, Ex 39:9; but also c. acc. + [[לְ]], Ho 2:10 gold they made into ([[ל]]) the Baal, Ju Jdg 8:27, Ex 27:3 (P), De 9:14, Je 37:15, Ez Eze 4:9, Is 44:17, Is 44:19; make something for ([[ל]] pers.), + [[מִן]] of material Ct So 3:9.

produce, yield: of grain, yielding meal Ho 8:7, Ho 8:7, vineyard, grapes Is 5:2, Is 5:2, Is 5:4, Is 5:4, Is 5:10, tree, fruit 2Ki 19:30 = Is 37:31, Ho 9:16, Je 12:2, Je 17:8, Ez Eze 17:23 (all fig.), Ge 1:11, Ge 1:12 (P); branches Job 14:9 and (fig.) Ez Eze 17:8; land, fruit Le 25:21 cf. Hb Hab 3:17, abs. Ge 41:47; of seed Is 5:10, vine, shoots Ez Eze 17:6 (fig.); of cows, yielding milk Is 7:22; hippop. producing fat Job 15:27.

prepare, esp. of dressing and cooking food, Ge 18:7, Ge 18:8, Ju Jdg 6:19, Jdg 13:5, 1Sa 25:18 (pass.), 2Sa 12:4, 2Sa 12:4, Ge 27:14, Ge 27:17, Ge 27:31, 2Sa 13:5, 2Sa 13:7, 1Ki 17:12, Ex 12:39 (+ [[ל]] reflex.); a bullock for sacrifice (v. infr.) 1Ki 18:23, 1Ki 18:25, 1Ki 18:26; [[כְּלֵי]] [[גוֹלָה]] Ez Eze 12:3 (+ [[ל]] reflex.); a chamber Ne 13:7; prepare to build (+ [[ל]] pers. and inf.).

make offering, e.g. [[עוֹלָה]] Ju Jdg 13:16, Je 33:18, Le 16:24, [[עוֹלָה וׇזֶבַח]] 2Ki 5:17 (+ [[ל]] dei), [[הַחַטָּאת]] Le 14:19, [[אִשֶּׁה]] Nu 15:3, Nu 15:14, various offerings 1Ki 8:64, Le 9:22, Ez Eze 45:17, Eze 46:2 +; + ´[[לי]] to ´[[י]] Le 17:9 +; also c. acc. of thing sacrificed (perh. orig. prepare or provide, v. supr.) Ez Eze 43:25, Eze 43:25, Eze 46:15, Le 14:30, Le 15:15, Le 15:30, Le 16:9, Nu 6:11, Nu 6:17, Ps 66:15 (+ [[ל]] dei) +; abs. = offer sacrifice Ex 10:25 (E + ´[[לי]]), to ([[ל]]) heathen gods 2Ki 17:32.
attend to, put in order: pare (the nails) De 21:12; wash (feet) 2Sa 19:25; trim (beard) v:2Sa 19:25 (cf. Fr. faire la barbe, Ger. die Haare machen).

observe, celebrate, religious festival, e.g. passover Ex 12:48, Nu 9:4, Nu 9:6, Nu 9:13, Jos 5:10, also (+ ´[[לי]]) Ex 12:48, Nu 9:10, Nu 9:14 (all P), De 16:1 +; sabbath Ex 31:16, De 5:15; feast of weeks De 16:10, booths De 16:13, Purim Es 9:21, Es 9:27, etc.

acquire property of various kinds (cf. ‘ make money ’) Ge 12:5, Ge 31:5 (J), Is 15:7, Je 17:11, Je 48:36, De 8:18, Ez Eze 22:18, Eze 28:4, Eze 28:4, Eze 38:12, 2Ch 32:29, Ec 2:8 ; + [[ל]] reflex. De 8:17, 2Sa 15:1, 1Ki 1:5; of fruits from vineyards, etc. Ps 107:37.

appoint priests 1Ki 12:31, 1Ki 13:33, 2Ch 2:17 (all + [[מִן]] source), a feast 1Ki 12:32, 1Ki 12:33 (+ [[ל]] pers.); ordain a sacrifice Nu 28:6, a festal day Ps 118:24; institute, [[אוֹב וְיִדְּעׂנִי]] ghost and familiar spirit 2Ki 21:6 = 2Ch 33:6 (cf. Dr:Dt 18, 11).
bring about, of ´[[י]]'s effecting a deliverance Ex 14:13 ([[לָכֶם]]), 1Sa 11:13, 2Sa 23:10 (ins. also ‖ 1Ch 11:13 Dr), v:2Sa 23:12; cause, sq. cl. c. [[שֶׁ]] Ec 3:14.
spend, pass, days of life Ec 6:12.
be done (pass. of

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: subj. [[מְלָאכָה]] Ju Jdg 16:11 (c. [[ב]] instr.), Ne 6:16 (c. [[מֵאֵת]] [[אֱלֽהִים]] ), v:Ne 6:9, Ex 12:16 + 4 t.; subj. om. Ez Eze 44:14, indef. Es 4:1; c. [[כֵּן]] Es 9:14; be done, [[כַּתּוֹרָה]] Ezr 10:3; be committed, of offence, De 13:15, Nu 15:24, Ec 4:1 + 3 t.; c. neg. not (yet) done, i.e. future Is 46:10; be accomplished, performed, fulfilled Ez 12:35, 12:38, Da 11:36, Es 5:5, Es 7:2, Es 9:12; be executed, carried out, of sentence Ec 8:11, decree Es 9:1; be followed, of counsel 2Sa 17:28; nearly = occur Ec 1:9, Ec 1:9, Ec 1:13, Ec 9:3, Ec 9:6, subj. [[מַעֲשֶׂה]] Ec 1:14, Ec 2:17, Ec 4:3, Ec 8:9, Ec 8:17, subj. [[הֶבֶל]] v:Ec 8:14, [[עִנְיׇן]] v:Ec 8:15.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Impf. c. neg., is (are) not done, not acc. to usage, of flagrant offences Ge 20:9 (E), Ge 29:26 (c. [[כֵּן]]), Ge 34:7 (both J), 2Sa 13:12 ([[כֵּן]]); hence (P) not to be done, forbidden by ´[[י]] Le 4:2, Le 4:13, Le 4:22, Le 4:27, Le 5:17.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: be done upon, against ([[ב]]) Da 9:12. †
(pass. of

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: be made, of conr. things 1Ki 10:20 = 2Ch 9:19 (throne), Je 3:16 (ark), 2Ki 12:14, Ez Eze 43:18, Ex 25:31, Nu 4:36 (P); c. acc. mat; Le 2:7.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: be produced from ([[מִן]]) vine Nu 6:4.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: be prepared, of food Ex 12:16, Le 6:14, Le 7:9 (all P), Ne 5:18, Ne 5:18.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: be offered, [[מִנְחָה]] Le 2:8, Le 2:11, kid Nu 28:15, Nu 28:24.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: be observed, passover 2Ki 24:22, 24:23 ([[ל]] dei) = 2Ch 35:18, 2Ch 35:19; Purim Es 9:28.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: be used Le 7:24 (P), + [[ל]] rei Le 13:51 (P) Ez Eze 15:5, Eze 15:5. †

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[עֻשֵּׂיתִי]] Ps 139:15 I was made.
